name: Fruity Racers
description:
Embody the Spinning Strawberry Ball that's inside of you and race to the finish line in this timed platformer! Made out of pure sweat and buggy tears!

Features:

  • Platforming
  • Fruity Wheel?
  • BUGS OF EVERY FLAVOR

My random theme was: A browser game where you race nondescript fruits to reach the highscore.

I tried to mimic Sonic the hedgehog but this is what came out! I know its buggy but enjoy :) If you run into any issues that halt your progress just press the reset button or refresh the browser. Made in a couple days for the Krass Jam.

A game by Ejmaster7

Made with Game Maker Studio and Pyxel

#Krassjam

Loop De Loops are Broken so be careful!
